title: (x) Engraver Miniscule - various suggestions {Florian}
content: Okay, got one for you. I have a client who wanted Engraver as the font choice on her card, and for a while that worked for her. Now she wants lower case letters on her cards, and to my knowledge, I don't know of any variation of Engraver that has miniscule letters. Does anyone know of one or can they recommend a passable substitute? Thanks for any assistance.
author: Megami

comments.content:
If you mean Engraver's Gothic, Burin Sans has a miniscule that looks related.  
 [http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/burin\_sans\_std\_regular/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103816/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/burin_sans_std_regular/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/burin\_sans\_std\_regular/")

Sorry, I should have been a little clearer: I mean along the lines of LH Engravers:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/engravers-bold-face/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020103816/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/engravers-bold-face/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/engravers-bold-face/")
